title: We are looking for a talented Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to lead our digital advertising efforts.
job_overview:
We are looking for a talented Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to lead our digital advertising efforts.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month based on ability and results

Role Responsibilities:

Create, manage, and optimize advertising campaigns.

Ensure campaigns deliver expected performance results.

Provide regular reporting and strategic insights.

Requirements:

At least 1 year running ads on Google or Facebook platforms.

Analytical and data-driven.

Ability to work remotely and manage timelines independently.
